original: Levin, Arnold Hjalmar, bankdirektör, Alingsås, f. 3/5/90 i Sexdrega, Älvsb. 1., av köpm. Amatus L. o. Alma Nilsison. G. 1. 17-42 m. Signe Hallberg, 2. 43’ m. Rödakorssystern Inge-horg Nilson. Barn: Bengt-Erik f. 19, Birgitta 27, Olof Gunnar Arnoldson 45. — Privatundervisn. 01-05, Kristinehamns prakt. sk. 06-07. Anst. å en-groskontor i Arvika 07, kamrer i A-B Gbgs Handelsbank i Tranemo 10-17, i Alingsås 17-38, dir. där sed. 39. Styr :led. i Alingsås konstförening sed. 42, medl. av Götiska Förb. Stud:-resa t. Tyskl. 37.
translated:
Levin, Arnold Hjalmar, bank director, Alingsås, born 3/5/90 in Sexdrega, Älvsborg County, son of merchant Amatus L. and Alma Nilsison. Married 1. in 1917 to Signe Hallberg, 2. in 1943 to Red Cross sister Ingeborg Nilson. Children: Bengt-Erik born in 1919, Birgitta born in 1927, Olof Gunnar Arnoldson born in 1945. 

Education: Private tuition in 1901-1905, Kristinehamn Practical School in 1906-1907. Employed at a wholesale office in Arvika in 1907, cashier at AB Gbgs Handelsbank in Tranemo in 1910-1917, in Alingsås in 1917-1938, director there since 1939. 

Positions: Board member of Alingsås Art Association since 1942, member of the Gothic Union. Study trip to Germany in 1937.
